meanings.definition: A system for sending messages electronically over a computer network.
meanings.sent1: I use email to send messages to my friends online.
meanings.sent2: She received an important email from her boss.
meanings.sent3: The email system decided to take a vacation and stopped working.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a complex email network, connecting thoughts effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The email service was as reliable as a well-oiled machine.

meanings.definition: A message or messages sent or received using email.
meanings.sent1: The email contained exciting news about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent2: He checked his email first thing in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The email seemed to have a mind of its own, popping up at unexpected times.
meanings.sent4: Her words in the email were like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The email notification chimed like a friendly reminder.
